text:
Such beautiful humans like Davide and Oti you can't find everywhere. It was a blast for us to share everything in those few days when they were around. Because, indeed, we felt like we welcomed back old friends. 

I remember when we opened the door and there was this calm couple coming in with their so big smiles on their faces. It was just like we expected from the way they wrote the request. Not to mention how respectful they were. Just perfect guest turning into perfect friends! And hearing all the traveling stories just reminded me how great living on the road is. 
 
Can't wait to see you again!
inverseReference:
{'id': '14034558', 'text': "Staying with Maria and Ben was just great. They are a very interesting and sweet couple, and you'll feel at ease from the first moment, we felt more like old friends or flatmates rather than guests.
It was one this rare experience when you know from the first moment that you'll want to keep in touch also in the future, and you'll be able to rely on them even in years without meeting.
Maria can be very lazy in the morning, but energetic when it's needed to, and always up for a smile or a chat. She is also really skilled with her violin, so don't miss one of her private concerts!
Not only it was great staying with them, but nice people attract people of the same kind, so we were able to share our experience also with other interesting couchsurfing guests they had during our stay.", 'createdDate': '2013-10-09T17:57:33Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '1725054'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: Davide and his girlfriend represent all that is good about couchsurfing. Excellent guests. Great talks. Green awareness. Architecture. Helpful. Genuily kind. Thoughtful and memorable talks. Curious on life, nature and people. People you connect with. People that easy blend with family and friends. Recommended
inverseReference: {'id': '12107780', 'text': "We spent 2 very nice nights at Rune's place with him and her partner Marina. He cooked food for us and we had some enjoyable conversations: he has had an interesting life, and he is a good talker. I liked to listen to his words and I soon felt a good connection. We also shared Halloween night, going for the first time in our lives knocking at the doors with the kids! :) We would have definitely liked to stay longer if we weren't in a rush to see northern lights!", 'createdDate': '2012-12-23T16:34:22Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '2306771'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text:
...this is such a difficult reference to write.
Wish I could just upload a picture of the smile I always have, when thinking of Davide and Oti!

We had this feeling even before meeting them, that they might be some kind of soulmates in many things that matter the most to us. As if that wouldn't have been enough, they turned out to be incredibly respectful, helpful, gentle and - even in the difficult situation they've been in then - cheerful people / guests!

Davide decided for a lifestyle that reflects so much of what I'm steering towards myself. I'm grateful for the experiences he shared in some of those long talks we had - and very hopeful that all this wasn't the last thing we shared together.

Warm hugs go out to those two beautiful souls I'd gladly call friends from now on!

text: I have not more blue hair hahaha :) he is my brother and he is helping me to start my path as a traveller! he is a quiet person and with so much experience! I think his profile says it all :)

text: Was very good for me host Davide here, he is a very nice boy, was very interesting talk to him, he has many good experience of travel, I love his semplicity and his way of life and travel. He gave me many tips for social work and travel, despite I was working I spent a good time with him here at home. Grazie Davide, a presto...
inverseReference: {'id': '13602112', 'text': 'Francesco hosted us at his family place even if the sister was coming back to visit the parents, and he even left us his room! text: Davide and Otti have been very kind. I enjoyed talking with them from the first moment we met, and after some time spent with them, i felt like they were old friends. They gave me some great ideas of places me and my gfwill visit in this summer's euro trips.
inverseReference: {'id': '12438673', 'text': 'It was the firs hosting experience for Catalin, but it looked like he was an experienced user, despite his young age. He is the youngest CSer that hosted me so far! He has all of the "skills" to be a long term nomad traveller, and he is really into music and punk culture. We enjoyed the alternative tour of Bucharest looking for abandoned buildings with him and her girlfriend! text: they landed round Malmo late night.that was my 1st weekend home after 1,5month business traveling.called him and told the situation-we will have big party night.Nothing of course was this time problem bec nobody else was interested to help.we talked little about CS experience and I told story of CS couple which I hosted and they did not care to have sex at the night in my place(that was sex talk)I left them home with access to everything.Morning I got notice on paper that they thank for hospitality but not happy with after party.I gues better to ask for host in 5*hotel and leave them notes or in some monastery so will be quiet.Im so sorry I have thin walls and so sorry I took you guys from the street.result of all is that I stopped to host people that way bec of this experience.Will send them all to you so can show how to be perfect host.Guessing this can take long time.I only can see you perfect CS user but not giver.less 10%feedback from surfers.hate this.pity did not check before.
inverseReference: {'id': '12108316', 'text': 'It was a double experience, at first very good, but then very uncomfortable. She and her daughter were very nice to host us last second, to give us the room of the teenager brother, moved to the living room with 2 friends. They offered us food, and we had some interesting conversations about China. Then they left to enjoy nightlife and we went to sleep. But when they came back home, mum and daughter brought home 2 guys from outside. They were in the kitchen,only 10cm of wall separating us,so we woke up from the first moment. They were not completely sober, and smoking. They started to talk for hours and to "sexually" provoke each other. At this point we were just extremely unconfortable. But all in a sudden one of the stranger guy entered in our room, switched on the light, and sat on the floor 5 minutes staring at us. We were acting like if we were sleeping, but we were really scared.This story ended at 7am,when the guys left. Then we left leaving a note expressing our disappointment', 'createdDate': '2012-12-23T18:32:30Z', 'experience': 'negative', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '2608635'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: When you get request from someone hitchhiking in December you won't decline it, right? And it was definitelly good decision - Otilia and Davide are super sweet, easy going, really nice to talk to (as far as I can tell :o)) and disorganized in this pleasant way how the real travelers generally are. It's a shame that I didn't have enough time to get to know them more. See you on the road.

text: Otilia and David are easy going people, very good company and with a lot of traveling experience. I wish I could have spent more time with you, it was great to have some break from reading, hiking and having dinner together. Hope to see you back in Lofoten in summer time!!
inverseReference: {'id': '12107732', 'text': "Even if she just was back from her spanish stay and she was extremely busy with her studies, Inger didn't hesitate to host us and be very flexible with our arrival. text:
I hosted Davide and Oti for one night. This was my first hosting experience and I will definitely do it again. They were very nice, easygoing and polite. We did not have so much time together but we did have an interesting conversation.
They were very discret. They made breakfast and left early in the morning before I woke up. I did not hear them. They left the room without leaving any signs of them.
I can recommend them.
inverseReference: {'id': '11706006', 'text': 'Karin hosted us at her place, in the best place of Uddevalla, overlooking the center from the top of a small hill. Even if it was her first hosting experience with couchsurfing, she was very flexible accepting us after a last minute call at the phone, she cooked some food for us, offered ice cream and shared very nice conversations. A very good start! Thank you!!', 'createdDate': '2012-10-25T18:05:49Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '1399694'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: For me Davide is one of those special people, who change the way you see life :) An amazing person, extremely calm, wise, enjoying beauty of life, full of incredible stories, person from whom you can learn a lot! The hitchhiking travel we made with him stayed in my heart as one of the most unforgetable experiences I had! I'm always very excited of meetings him, wherever it is! It is always a pleasure to spend time with him!
inverseReference: {'id': '12108540', 'text': "I think that Maria is holding the record for hosting me in 3 different places! I surfed her place in Ruse and Sofia in Bulgaria, and recently in Bratislava, Slovakia! We met almost 2 years ago during an outdoor training in Hungary where we shared 10 days. Then we hitchhiked together to Bulgaria, 2 days full of adventures I won't forget easily. And then we met again first in Sofia, then in Slovakia. She is a very nice girl, generous, happy and sweet, and of course reliable. So don't miss to meet or host her!", 'createdDate': '2012-12-23T19:19:31Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '4172209'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: Davide and Otilia are two awesome travellers. Relaxed people who love life and seeing the world. It was my pleasure to host them and recommend that you meet them.

text: REally? He and his girlfriend sent me a very last minute msg, and even that I wasn't prepared for having any CSs I said yes cause I felt bad with the knowledge that anyone replied to theirs request, and didn't want to leave them like that on a cold december night. I had over my brother with his 2 friends, I was about to go out which I said from the very first beginning, I even ASKED them at my own place if it is okay for them If I smoke, lol :) Than after party I came with my old friends, cause I usually do this, I cant see any reasons why I shouldn't. That one of them went to the room -sorry, but acting like you're sleeping all the time, instead of saying anything is just weird for me. Anyway, that wasn't any stranger to me, and please watch your mouth a bit cause txting Mum and the daughter brought 2 guys from outside is just improper and offensive. So, If u guys want to spend quiet night, choose HOTEL instead and stay inflexible as You are. At the end they didn't even say bye.

text:
David and Otilia are the coolest and most extraordinary couchsurfers I have met so far. Their stories are deeper and more informative than any book in the World. Their lifestyles are more inspiring and demanding than those of anyone else. Their decision-making, degree of trust to the World and the way the World takes care of them are so unique and magnetic that it's just impossible to dislike their personalities! 

My best possible references! Keep it up! My home is your home! :)
inverseReference: {'id': '12108022', 'text': 'It was a great choice to stay with Ildar! It was very easy to get along with him, and soon we understood that he was a special one. We had a great connection and probably we were spreading positive vibrations around, since first we were able to enter for free to the opera house, and after we received for free as a present 3 tickets for the Christmas concert at the cathedral that were costing 40‚Ç¨ each! We shared meals, he showed us around, and we went for a beautiful walk at night around an icy lake not far from his place. He is nice to talk with, sensible and enjoyable!', 'createdDate': '2012-12-23T17:28:58Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '2587585'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

But they was nice and relaxed so it all went really smooth :)

text: I had a great time hosting Davide and his girlfriend Otilia. They were my first surfers and my first encounter with couchsufing, and thanx to them i now know for sure that this is a great system and society to join. Thanx for the cooking, cleaning (slightly embarassing but very nice!) and for the great company! And thanx for watching Josefine while i was away.
inverseReference: {'id': '12107633', 'text': "It was Maria's first experience with couchsurfing and we couldn't believe how much trust she was putting on us! We felt at home from the first moment: she is very hospitable, friendly and easy to talk with. She also made sure we had a great experience by lending us plenty of winter clothes to enjoy the outdoor at low temperatures. We also shared meals, not only with her but also with the parents that were very nice with us. And when we came back on our retourn journey she didn't hesitate to host us again even if she already had different plans!\r\nIf you get to meet here, you should definitely ask her to speak English with Zambian accent!", 'createdDate': '2012-12-23T16:02:57Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '4991844'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: We share the interest for sustainable architecture and climbing, we had very interesting talks!

text: a very good experience!

text:
It was very nice to host Davide and Oti, they're very kind and humble people! I'm sorry that they had some trouble to find the place, 'cause I wasn't enough precise... I love their way of traveling! And I wish I can do like them someday!
Btw, thanks a lot for your souvenir!! it is really well though!
I've seen you've already reached Oslo! I know what it comes next...brrr cold!! good luck!!
inverseReference: {'id': '11705551', 'text': 'Staying with Marc was great! text:
We hosted Davide and Otilia in Oslo. They are nice and respectable people, real travelers and adventurers. And our 8 month old Daniel liked them both a lot:)
Wish you good luck with your traveling. Have amazing time in the North and come and say hello any time you are in Oslo.
Best regards from our family
inverseReference: {'id': '11706159', 'text': 'When we were almost desperate, blocked in a gas station nearby Oslo, after 2 different hosts one after the other cancelled their ospitality, eventually Mariam and Arni invited us to their place, and it was a great staying! We had some good vegan food and talked and laughed with their little boy Daniel changing expression every minute :) They are very nice and even offered us their own room!', 'createdDate': '2012-10-25T18:24:57Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '2826854'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: Davide is a very interesting person with a lovely courteous personality. I would have loved to know more about the stories he has to tell and of course seen the pictures from his trips - Davide... fill your blog with them - please!!!! It was great meeting you!

Davide is an amazing guy, peaceful, relaxed, full of good vibrations, one of those few persons that you feel are in harmony with the world.

I had the great pleasure and opportunity to share some space and time with him and Otti, twice. The first time was great, and the second was just like having old friends at home.
They are the kind of persons that you really enjoy hosting :-)
Two real travellers, love the way they live their lifes.

I'd say they are marvellous guests, but I won't say it, 'cos I didn't feel like I had "guests" at home. You feel really comfortable among them.

Wish you the best, and hope our roads cross again, somewhere, sometime :-)

Abrazos.
inverseReference: {'id': '11143042', 'text': "Dani is an amazing and inspiring person, full of life and always laughing. He hosted us at his place for 2 times and it was a pleasure to stay with him. We were comfortable from the first moment as if we knew his since long time. He gave us a comfy room, brought us to a proper hitchhiking spot with his friend Jorge and also introduced us to some great vegetarian food. He is a great photographer with a lot of cool works to show you. Don't miss the chance to meet him!", 'createdDate': '2012-08-25T18:13:37Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '2790508'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: It was a pleasure to host Davide and his girlfriend. They are a sweet, polite, considerate, discreet, independent, and pleasant couple to be with. Plus I had some good laughs when talking feelings about food! Thank you ;)
inverseReference: {'id': '10827877', 'text': 'It was very hard to find an host in Madrid, and eventually we were very lucky to find probably the best :) Nnmko was busy when we requested, but then she proposed us to postpone our arrival and we were able to meet. text:

text: Davide made a lot of people smile and made a lot fo friends while living in Sadhana Forest India. I was very happy to meet him and see himewith his camera taking wonderful photos. He has been a good friend to us since then and I hope we have another chance to spend more time together.
inverseReference: {'id': '7510581', 'text': 'I met Jamey in 2010, when we lived in the same community in India, Sadhana Forest, for 4 weeks. He was a long term\r\nvolunteer there, so he was always busy helping people and getting stuff done. And he was THE reference point for the other volunteers, whenever you need something, you look for Jamey :) He has a strong personality and willpower, and he was an example on how to live according to the "sustainable" principles. And at the same time he can turn in a funny and crazy character. So, if you still have any doubts, just meet him :)', 'createdDate': '2011-06-04T18:55:02Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'other', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '10022'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: We host Davide for 2 nights. He is very positive and open minded person. We like very much talking with him. We had a nice 45km cycle trip around Pleven. He show us how the Italian coffee need to be prepared! After he leave our house we was really amazing surprised from the present he hide for us under the bed sheets! Thank you so mush! Hope to see you soon together with you girlfriend this time! Have a save trip!
inverseReference: {'id': '8348553', 'text': "My stay with Galin and Filipa was one of the best CS experience of the last months! I first stayed with them for 2 nights on my way to Macedonia. We had nice conversations about our common interests, sharing useful information, and dreaming about future plans. They are appsionate mountaneers and nature lovers, a sweet couple as it's difficult to find. They cooked very nice meals for me, and give me space and time for resting from a tiring trip. And we tried a new experience, with Skypesurfing, also my girlfriend was in the house with us :)\r\nWe had an amazing daytrip in the nature, visiting a Canyon and some lakes, over 40 km by bicycle. A real CS experience and amazing places I wouldn't have seen without them!\r\nAnd on my way back from Macedonia I still stayed with them for one night, on a last minute call!! Hopefully we will meet again, next time with my girlfriend, maybe going to climb some nice mountains! :)", 'createdDate': '2011-09-05T15:22:01Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '1446570'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text:
I'm glad you enjoyed grandma's cottage :D Davide is great guy, he told me some things about
yoga, we went to the lake to have a swim and we climb the Ceahlau mountain, good days :)
inverseReference: {'id': '8081246', 'text': 'Radu is a super relaxed guy, that try to enjoy life, and has a vegetarian lifestyle, but not for eating :) Despite the short notice he drove from the city where he is living, to this countryside house, only to host us. text: I hosted Davide one night on his way to the northern lights. text: I hosted Davide in my collective and it was a pleasure. Davide is really interesting, intelligent and funny with a positive and happy attitude. He's warmly welcomed to surf again at any time :)
fromPublicAddressDescription: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
inverseReference: {'id': '7294087', 'text': 'I really enjoyed my stay at Daniel place. I appreciated his way of being able to be keep balance and being fair, clever and open-minded despite living in a way that other people would call extreme. I had fun and I learnt from them.\r\nAll of the people living there + more folks coming and going, are interesting and will make your stay there something to remember. They shared with me everything they had, time, food and sleeping space. It was nice for one time to watch things "from the other side", not having to explain about hitchhiking and being watched like a monster because there everyone is hitchhiking! Or instead of looking for tasty fancy food, questioning "Is the food from the dumpster? No? sorry I cannot eat it!"', 'createdDate': '2011-05-06T07:29:13Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'host', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '574096'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text: I've been really happy to host him. I didn't count the days, but it was a long time. It was a pleasure to hear about the stories from Cuba and Asia. The guy is just amazing, he travelled half of the world and he has really good trips. He is a hitch-hiking expert as well. I'll strongly recommend him as a CS.
inverseReference: {'id': '7132869', 'text': "Robert was a great host, easygoing and funny, he treated me from the first moment as an old friend, giving me all the trust he could, introducing me to his friends, playing football, attending classes, inviting me to road trips... And it's also thanks to him that I could accomplish the mission of my trip: watching Northern Lights!!", 'createdDate': '2011-04-13T21:04:49Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '1028751'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text:
I was lucky to host Davide for one night (short but really nice!)Davide has a lovely energy, spreading both inspiration and calmness. I really hope to see Davide soon again, and he's always welcome to my house. Don't hesitate to host Davide, I'm sure you'll learn a lot from him and his approach to life. 

I update this reference because I had the pleasure to host him again! Mira and I like him so much we tried to convince him to buy a house in the area, hopefully he'll do in the future. A warm and tender person who is really independent in a very good way!
inverseReference: {'id': '7009898', 'text': "Catrine hosted me in Umea, despite the short notice and the busy schedule. She is an happy person always smiling, and living an alternative life without any pressure from the society. Unfortunely I wasn't able to meet also Miras, but this is a good reason to go back :)\r\nEDIT: And in fact I went back :) On the way back of my trip I was able to stop in the countryside town of Lovanger to meet again Catrine and get to know Miras and their little zoo. And definitely it was not a mistake!! They are a lovely couple and I had a great time there chatting, laughing, telling crazy stories and relaxing. After this 2 days with them I really feel restored. And the eagle didn't kidnap me, so I'm coming back to buy that house and be your psycho (not weird) nieghboor! :)", 'createdDate': '2011-03-28T00:50:23Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '717957'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text:
Davide is a great guy! I first met him when i saw his "travel companion wanted" topic in Ist-CS. I had just returned from a HH trip in SE asia back then and i still had some time to do some travelling in Turkey. 
I am glad that we have decided to hitchhike together eventually. Eventhough he was a lit bit worried about HH at the beginning; he turned out to be the most hardcore traveller that i had ever seen. While we shared similar ideas about "drugs"; i still was drinking and smoking whenever it is available for free; while he never drunk a single beer or a little cigarette. That was something that really suprised me and which made me feel like a little kid near him and i really learned from him a lot. I think nothing can ever stop him from travelling, He can adapt the harshest situations on his way to the pea. He is also quite picky about food. :) The very only Mediterrian that i know who doesn't eat tomatoes!
I really hope to see him again, and i am sure i will!:)
All the best mate!
fromPublicAddressDescription: Esbjerg, Region of Southern Denmark, Denmark
inverseReference: {'id': '5652083', 'text': 'I first met √úmit for a night out in Istanbul, where we decided to start an hitchiking trip through Turkey togheter. After a few days, our ways split to several directions but we still met at his house at the end of his trip, where he also hosted me. Despite we weren\'t able to finish our tour togheter because of his upcoming university duties, I\'m extremely grateful to him because he helped me to be confident about making a long HH travel that eventually lasted for me over 40 days. I don\'t know if I would have done it without meeting him the first week. Despite he is very young you would never guess his age just talking with him, since his knowledge and interests are far more developed than the average. While travelling he can adapt to every condition without any problems, enjoying every aspect of local life but a little less about what he call just "stones" :)', 'createdDate': '2010-08-30T07:30:13Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'surf', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '1355348'}, 'from': {'id': '399154', 'publicName': "Davide Vadala'", 'publicAddress': {'id': '3104302', 'description': 'Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/ht-images.couchsurfing.com/u/399154/d5f2b7e8-994b-4edc-8e4b-7a9594761f74', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text:
he was my guest for 4 days and my idea was that : davide is like a boy you want to adapt :) he is so lovely warm person and full of joy.
i had nice time while chatting and going out ! thanks to davide that he made me go to public concert and firework show.it was amazing ! 
i hope you will reach your aims soon , you derserve much more ! have safe journey with full of new experiences!
inverseReference: {'id': '4295145', 'text': "Tugba is an amazing girl, she has a lot of interests that fill her life, and will fill you with admiration for her. She is so strong and determinated that you wouldn't imagine it. She just do what she feels like doing, so you could end up just having some lovely conversations at her place, or moving from a concert to the teather, to the traditional music, to drinking something, or running under the rain to see the fireworks over the sea! text:
Davide saved on a last minute request my friend Matt and I. 
He was very flexible and open minded guy. 
His life experience is worth to know about it. We spend a few hours together the 2 days we stayed with him but we always felt really comfortable and easily got along with him. We would definitely stay again with him. 
Thanks for everything and good karma Davide. 
Hugs.

text: Davide is such a knowledgeble and experienced traveller who learned from over 8+ years on full-time travelling adventures how this world breaths, connects and work uniting cultures. Plus, he is oviously an expert on Rome, since he wrote top articles on the subject, so you will be in good hands. Thank you so much for taking me in last minute! You're awesome:)
Davide  is a true traveler! he has many stories to tell you. it's flexible, he have advice to give  to you about many things, and if you need help for something, he give to you it! RECOMMENDED :)!
Davide is legend. He is a great artist and wonderful to speak with about all of his adventures! Great person to stay with!

Super chill guy. Also really respectful and kind too--you can tell within the first 15 seconds of meeting him. Plus, he's got an amazing head of hair. Can't wait to see where our paths will cross in the future!

text:
Jimmy is a very kind and high educated man. He showed me a lot of interesting places in Rome and told a lot about these places. He is good informed about the city, because he love his own city and walking with him you can feel his love to Rome. We spent a great time together talking, walking it was funny and very interesting. I'll be very happy to stay with him again and host him in my house. 
I'm very thankful him for the host and walking.

Jimmy I don't know where to begin... I experienced so much during my stay in Rome that is hard to put into words. First, thank you for opening the doors of your home. Your home is located in the heart of Rome, minutes away from Vatican City, and minutes away from the Colosseum, and all the old Rome. Public transport makes it so accessible, and it's steps away. Thanks for having a room for me with its own private bathroom, and wifi. Your persona is extraordinary, smart, intelligent, kind, humble, caring, active, thoughtful, knowledgeable, and patient. Thanks for giving me a tour of your amazing city, for taking me to eat at local traditional Italian food, for cooking for me at your ants house, Marcia, and for attending with me to the vigilia pascual, and the general audience in the Vatican where we saw pope Francis. I will never forget! "Al√©grese la tierra, inundada de la nueva luz, el esplendor del Rey destruy√≥ las tinieblas, destruy√≥ las tinieblas, las tinieblas del mundo..."

I stayed with Jimmy for 3 nights during my stay in Rome. He gave me very detail information to get to his place from the airport. When I arrived he tried to make me feel like home. The next day he spend the entire with me showing me around the city. It was like hiving a personal tour guide lol. :) he is so knowledgeable. He explained to me with details the history of each place we visited. I recommended him as a host! thanks for everything

Jimmy is an exceptionally kind and thoughtful person. His hospitality made me feel comfortable during my exploration of Rome. Even though he has a thesis due in a few weeks, Jimmy happily had me over and more. He emphasized a few times to me, "this is your home, do whatever you want". He trusted me with keys to the flat and wanted me to have an excellent experience in Rome. I don't know Italian, so we couldn't communicate that much but he always had a smile and our few interactions were very pleasant. Jimmy will take care of you. Highly recommend

Jimmy is an extremely kind, generous and genuine person who is full of life. I honestly couldn't speak more highly of him. Not only did he meet me at the station, give up his bed for me while he slept on the floor, pay for my breakfast he also showed me places where I could busk in Rome show me the correct bus to those places. I'm so thankful for meeting Jimmy I cannot recommend him enough if you get a chance to meet him I suggest you do he is an amazing person. Thank you Jimmy for such an amazing time!  (Lo siento que no escribi etse reference mi espa√±ol no es bueno).

text: Valerio is a very friendly, positive and interesting guy! I enjoyed to spend time with him talking on different topics. as a host he took care about me from the moment I arrive to the Rome station till the moment I left his home (met me by car from station as I arrived late at night, gave all indications for local transportation, stayed available in case of any question I had). thank you again for your hospitality! it was a pleasure to meet you! a presto!:)

Though me and my friends haven't managed to stay at Valerio's place (we changed our plans), he offered to show us Rome in the evening. He was very kind and easy going, we laughed a lot, and saw many places in the city we would probably miss without Valerio. He also showed us a place with very tasty pizza. We had a lot of fun, knew a lot of things, sang aloud some nice songs in the car on our way! :D We would definitely like to hang out with Valerio again. 
Anna, Elena, Valeria
fromPublicAddressDescription: Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, Russian Federation

text: Valerio was so kind to host us despite his very busy schedule, and he generously let us use his own room. His home is located in a quiet area, the sunset from the balcony is truly stunning. Valerio is so fun, you can't stop smiling and laughing while being with him! He is also an adventurer, has some amazing stories of his bike trips, and a big fan of Hungary which made us feel very proud actually. Thanks a lot for your hospitality, the classical gelato place, and your cheerful company, which we won't forget!

He was very kind and also aware of my needs
Straightforward in all of his answers, honest and family oriented. I would definetely hang out with Valerio any other time!!! Thank you so much for your hospitality.
fromPublicAddressDescription: La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico

text: We enjoyed spending time with Valerio, having beers and pizza, Aperitivo and driving in the city. An excellent guy!

My friends and I stayed in Valerio's apartment for 3 days. He picked us up from the airport by his car, as his apartment was located far from the center of Rome. It was really nice of him to do that, also he prepared for us his room and bed to sleep, he prepared towels and water. He showed us the city, told about the main sightseeings, explained everything. Also he took us to the restaurant where we ate one of the best Italian pizzas! 
Thank you, Valerio! Hope to see you in Moscow! :)

I had a really nice stay at Valerio‚Äòs place! He‚Äôs a very hospitable, smart and fun person.  We hung out a few times, he showed me some great places and even brought me to the airport on my last day. We had a very fun time and I don‚Äôt think I would have found a better host for my stay in Rome!

I had a great time with Valerio ! He's really nice, easy-going and funny, and his house is very comfy and quiet
thanks to him, we've been able to see some special spots and points of view in Rome by night
I hope to see you in France someday ! :) take care ! x
We had a lovely stay and time with Valerio, he's fun to be with, easy-going and a very nice guy who inspires you to travel even more, I absolutely recommend him :). See you soon in Budapest! ;)

Valerio was a wonderful host and we stayed with him for two nights. He picked us up from bus station late in the evening and showed us a few tourist attractions on our way home. He explained to us how to drive to the city center and he also managed to find time to hang out with us. He is a great person and an amazing conversationalist.

I spent two nights at Valerio‚Äôs place and what would tell more about his hospitability that he was willing to be the actual couchsurfer and gave up on his bed for me. He accepted me during the week even though he was working and could still spare some time for me in the evenings. üòä
Of course, we bonded over cycling straight away but Valerio was interested in any topic that would come up and he has a surprisingly good memory, take care, he‚Äôd remember everything you say! üòÉ
His laughter is amazing which comes with a good sense of humour, fortunately. üòÉ Honestly, the best driver I‚Äôve ever met in person: there is no such thing as an impossible parking spot for him!

It was pleasure to hang out with Valerio. He is funny guy and has lot to say. Sharing stories with him was really enjoyable. He was so nice he take us to airport with him car. I totally recommend Valerio.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Brno, South Moravian Region, Czech Republic

text: Leo ist a great guy, super funny and can talk about anything in just about any language üòú you will definitely have a fun time with him around.
We met 3 years ago in madrid, the traveled toghether, now he is in buenos aires nad we spend a good time. I totaly recomend leo as guest!

Leonardo stayed in my apartment one night, he sent me massage very last minutes and I let him inside, he is friendly and respectful person and easy to get long with your Flatmates, he can speak fluent in severed languages with a good communicate with the people that he meets for first time, would definitely host him again
Great guy really trust worthy and easy going! Definitely will catch up with him again
He is a nice boy.and I suggest you to have a great time with him.

Do you belive in aliens? :D Time spent with Leonardo will always remain in my memory, he is a very fun and happy guy, if you host him you will not regret not one bit. I hope he comes back again  and stay with us. Ciaoo.

We met with Leonardo really briefly when he stayed for a few hours with me before his flight. He's a funny and intelligent person with quite the adventurous spirit. I admire his approach towards life and there's definitely a lot to learn from him. It was cool meeting Leonardo and I would definitely recommend hosting him. I hope our paths cross again again next time he visits the city :)

Leonardo is crazy, positive guy. We become very good friends. 
All best, see you very soon. üòÅ

You will be glad to host Leo, communicaton is so easy with him! Flexible with your program and a very nice and smart guy. 

Y las historias que te quedan por contar :) me diste ganas se darle al hitchhike, disfruta de tu viaje hermano!

I hosted Leonardo one night at the beginning of his hitchike trip in Romania. He is a very positive, funny and considerate person. It was really fun to have him around as he makes jokes and has interesting things to say. Definitely helpful too;) He helped me to prepare the vegetarian soup:) Don`t miss the chance to host him or meet him.
Leonardo is very social and friendly guy, and excellent company. I really enjoyed our evening talking about travelling and hitch hiking and life in general. I hope you made it to Timisoara!

Leonardo in friendly And fun persone with his friends, I know him just from her words in the phone, I recommend to meet thes man in italia, I hope to see you next time friend, best regards from Sahara.

He is open minded, fun and extremely interesting person. I loved his philosophy of travelling. Leo is very easy going person. We talked over many interesting topics spanning from football to travelling. I hope to see him again perhaps in Iran or Bolivia üòâüòâ
Leonardo safe trip and enjoy your stays mate.. Be salamati !!!

It has been a pleasure to help Leo on the first leg of his journey.
We spent just one night together, so it seems that we could still have so many things to share, but I hope we will meet together in Rome or somewhere else in the world :)
He's funny and sociable, nonetheless discrete so I really recommend him as an host!
Have a good journey and enjoy every moment!

Leonardo with his 21 years is the smartest guy I have ever known in the world of travels,he speaks 5 languages ‚Äã‚Äãand has already visited 27 countries.I was hosted in the house of his wonderful family surrounded by the green hills of Settebagni in Rome. Super recommended.
He is really crazy guy. It was my first time in Rome, he met me and showed way to my hostel.

Was my best Couchsurfing ever!!
He is the most funny and friendly guy that I meet in Italy! 
He did me a great tour around all Rome! 
He have a awesome house that everyone is so friendly!
And have a very sweet dog! Sofi
I recommend to stay with him 100% 
Ciao amigo m√≠o!! No vemos pronto!

Leooo!! I don't even know what to write about him! We met in a really strange time.  He is really curious about cultures and always going for more. I hope him good luck with the twisted crazy mind of him! He showed me the city shared everything in his house,super funny and easy going person!! I'm really glad now I have him in my life and that  we get along very well. See you in Ankara man!!
Leonardo was absolutely amazing!!! Great conversation and so kind and flexible. Wish I could've stayed longer with his family. So thankful for him! Definitely recommend him to anybody. Very genuine.

Leonardo is an easy person who likes to help. Unfortunately he was really busy during the nights I spend there and we barely could know each other, what I think it's a disappointment when you're doing couchsurfing. I was lucky that at the same time he also hosted another girl and she was such a nice company, so the experience was great at the end. I just wish he had more time to show us something, but the surfing was really ok.

Leonardo is a young adventurer with a lot of plans. Very friendly and easy to talk to. Thank you and your family a lot! 
Hope to meet you again somewhere in the worldüòâ

As we met, we felt we had known each other for years. Leonardo, a young and funny youngster, received us with a warm smile and made us feel at home. The home is very friendly and is located in a quiet neighborhood full of pleasantly fragrant flowers. We had an interesting discussion about the CS spirit. We learned from Leonardo many interesting facts about Rome. It will be a great pleasure to host Leonardo in our home and help him to know better our country. Greetings to your parents! With friendship, Anca and Emilian

Leonardo is a nice, open and laidback guy. Even though we didn't spend much time together because he worked quite a lot I really enjoyed our conversations about the world and travelling and our workout session on his balcony :-D Grazie mille per tutti Leornado and see you in Munich! ;-)

I would be completely lost without Leonardo. He literally gave me a map of Rome and drew me 2 separate day trip routes. Then, when I royally screwed up, boarded the wrong train late at night on my way to Florence, and ended up back in Rome, Leonardo offered to let me stay with him again. All nights I stayed with him, I met him at the hostal where he works, relaxed in the cafe a bit while he finished up, and we went back to his home together, so I wouldn't get lost! 

Leonardo has done some long term travel himself and works at a hostel, so he's very knowledgeable about his city and empathetic to a traveler's woes and adventures. He lives in a beautiful home an easy train ride from Roma Termini station, and has converted his large family room to a cool couchsurf hubspot by adding 3 beds. He'll make sure to provide you with exactly what you need, and more Nutella at your disposal than you could ever think you'd need. Definitely stay with Leonardo, you couldn't ask for a kinder host.

Leo is a real good kid.  We didn't get a chance to spend much time together but you get a sense of his warmth and hospitality immediately after meeting him.

Hoping we get to spend more time together while I'm in Rome and looking forward to meeting up or hosting him when he comes to NY.

Gratzie and ciao my friend!

I stayed at Leonardo's place for one night and it was great! I felt really welcome and he helped me with everything I needed. The only thing I regret is that we didn't have a lot of time together, but I'm sure we'll meet again :)

Leonardo is a great host, lovely and very thoughtful!

I hope our paths cross again!! :D

text: Come on... This man... He is absolutely unforgettable! I stayed at his home for 2 nights with a friend of mine and it was an amazing experience! Leonardo is a very interesting man, which has a lot of stories to tell! Also, he is a true Italian by his way of life, that we enjoyed a lot. Maybe he even changed our look at life a bit ;) He got us way closer to the Italian life and culture. And on this stay we realised how small the world is. He knew only one Lithuanian in his life, and what a coincidence it was, that we knew her too )) More about the couch... Everything in his house is really, really cool! How should I call it... 5 star Couchsurfing place? His family is great too! The only problem, that it is far from the city and not very easy to get there. But everything else was unforgettable. By the way, if You love animals, You will love this place too :) Best wishes, Leo! Hope we meet again! I recommend this host!

Leonard made my stay in Rome great eventhough he had an exam coming up. He hosted me, we cooked together and talked about hitchhiking and our travels. 
Because of his exam we couldn`t spend much time together but the time we spend was so nice that I really want to meet this guy again and we already talked about travelling together. 
Host him and become part of his amazing travels or stay with him and you will have a great time too!

What can I say about Leonardo? He is funny, nice, open mind ‚Ä¶a great person to spend time with! 
Unfortunately we stayed with him just one day but he was simply AWESOME and welcoming with us -me and my friend Daniela-
So try to stay with him,  you will have a lovely time a lots of great conversations! :D

Sean accepted me to be a guest at his home, months before I travelled. I'm so appreciative of how cool a host he was. I stayed with him for 2 nights in a very nice big house on the outskirts of the city. Sean is such an easy going guy and thinks about the world and it's beauty a lot. I loved spending time with him, chatting and listening to his travelling experiences. We also shared a bottle of Scotch :), Sean makes me wish I began travelling when I was a little younger. He hopes to move to the UK...maybe he will move to Glasgow, who knows? I know we will meet again, hopefully soon. I've met a friend and Sean will always have a home in Glasgow, 

Grazie, Gringo!!!!

Lovely experience with Genna! He is a caring, thoughtful and super helpful person. I enjoyed listening to his stories from worldwide trips, we spent the evening with his cool friends and then I gladly followed his recommendations of locations and itineraries. 
I wish we had time for more exchange, and I hope that we will meet again someday somewhere.

I found his flat very easily and when he opened the door, his smiling face assured me that I'm going to have prefect days here. Staying with him made my trip to Rome much more memorable. He handed over his flat key to me as soon as I arrived and trusted me, though I later realised that he's already fallen victim to robbery and theft twice, one time he lost his car and again he lost his motorbike. But those accidents couldn't make him lose trust in people, because he himself is extremely trustworthy. His life philosophy is "brooding over the probability of bad happenings is much worse than the bad happenings themselves" ! It is very cheap and trivial to attribute to him such words as kind, nice etc, what I can say is that if the world has more people like him it would be a better place to live in. 
Ciao. Majid.
fromPublicAddressDescription: Yazd, Yazd Province, Iran (Islamic Republic of)

text:

It was our first couchsurfing experience. He met us despite our late visit. He has a stylish apartment with views of the Italian beauty.  He is a very good man with an open and kind heart. Those two days were magical and Alessandro made it even more beautiful. Thank you for everything, Alessandro. All the best. With good wishes, your Maulen and Meruert.

Alessandro, our savior perhaps is the most funniest and coolest guy I‚Äôve met . The day that we spent with him was full of adventurous and entertaining moments which I will never forget. He cooked a tasty dinner for me and my friends and it was fantastic.

Alessandro is a super man, with a good sense of humor and he is really thoughtful and helpful! He really helped us with a couch and we spent a wonderful evenings with a beautiful dinners on his balcony with his friend Lara (Alessandro, say her Hello from us! ).

text: Alessandro really helped out my partner and I when we needed a last minute couch in Rome. He was super generous with his home and actually took us in even though he already had two other surfers that night! Very friendly guy

text:
Manuele is a very spontanious, funny, open minded, talkactive and positiv person. He can cook realy good pasta and other things :-).

Enrico is the perfect guest! Kind, considerate, and really fun. He was very respectful of my apartment and really cool to hang out with. Enrico was punctual and very easy to get a hold of. I cannot say enough good things. He is welcome to stay with me again anytime! :)
He was very kind and he wanted to go for a walk. He's a nice guy. I would take a walk with him again surely.

First of all - Enrico is a great person! 
He is the first surfer I've ever hosted and I'm really lucky with this experience :) 

We changed our plans and I've hosted him for 1 night. But we spend wonderful time together! He has a lot of stories about people he met around the world and volunteering in Africa. I was always afraid of this continent and now I've started to think to volunteer there one day! 
He is very thankful and easy going. Most of the time we were talking in English, but I study Italian and some topics we tried to discuss in it. Thank you for you patience, Enrico :)

Will be very happy to see you again in Rome or in the middle of nowhere!
Arrivederci!

Enrico is such a good host! Thank you for the great time!)
He is very friendly and understanding, have interesting life stories. His apartment is very cozy and clean. We couldn‚Äôt even imagine that it would be so wonderful to stop at Enrico‚Äôs place) And also now we can cook real pasta! It‚Äôs amazing! :)

Enrico is a very funny guy, unselfish and respectful. He accepted my super last request and he saved me. His house is very cool, clean and very well connected. He showed me the city and we had great time with his friends!!!. Hope to see you soon! Thanks so much for all bro!

Wow, Enrico was incredibly generous, helpful, fun/funny, and easy to get along with. I had a ton of fun breaking out into a random karaoke session, talking about our life experiences, and sharing jokes left and right. He helped me tour Rome and even accompanied me on many of the sites, which was a real treat. Was even so kind to help wash out some chocolate stains from my new jeans...above and beyond!! Haha. A good time overall and can‚Äôt wait to visit again.

Enrico is the perfect gentleman! We had some great conversations and he also took time to show me some awesome places around Rome. I really appreciate all the advice he gave me and the wonderful stories he told me. I loved that he enjoyed his time in my two beloved countries, Colombia and India. 
Hope to see you soon somewhere around the world! Thank you once again for everything :)

It was so funny experience, Enrico is a friendly guy, he made me taste the differents food in Rome, the flat is nice, and not too far the center, good location. As he said he's the best host in the world lol! Thanks for everything and I really enjoy my stay with him!
He is a kind person that always want to help you wirh anything. He took us in his car for curious places in Rome. He has a  really nice flat  near to train station and bus stop. Good guy!!!

Staying with Enrico was a pleasure! Enrico is a very nice host! He is respectful, trustworthy and a good touristic guide! He guided me to go to the best places of Rome, and I could enjoy it a lot every day I've been there.

I'm very happy to have met Enrico! He is  really nice guy, polite, respectful and always did the best to made me feel comfortable :)

I'm really lucky that I met Enrico! He really saved me! Firstly, I should to stay with another host, but, in one day before my coming to Rome he let me know that he can't to host me üò≥ When Enrico accepted my request I was really saved, because, I got a cold and was ill üò∑Enrico met me near the metro station, drive to home by car. Liliana and Maurizio are very kind, generous, friendly, hospitable! Their house and garden are amazing as a museum! Liliana cooked a great Italian food and Maurizio made the best coffee I ever had üòâ
Enrico, because of you my trip to Rome was incomparable! Hope to see you again! Give my the best regards to Liliana and Maurizio!!!

Thank you! You made my trip to Rome and you're more than welcome in Poland Enrico! :) a

text: Enrico was a perfect host! He is very interesting, open minded and kind person. We talked a lot and it was very interesting. He gave us national food ad it was so delicious!! His apartments are very comfortable and nice. We was really lucky to met him. Thank u Enrico !

Enrico hosted me and my friend in Rome for two nights! Before our coming he send me many tips about Rome and when we arrived he send us even a map how to get to his place. 
When we arrived he took care of us a lot! Even if he didn't have a lot of time because of work, he tried to spend with us as much time as he could.  He also prepared for us a really great dinner and the next day he took us to a restaurant to try some Italian food. He is really joyful, friendly and open minded :) I can recommend to stay with him in 100%, you will have an amazing time!

When we met Enrico, we understood that he is most kind person that we've  ever met!

We spent only two nights in Enrico's house but our stay was perfect and we had a great time talking about kidnapings, bio chickens and travels. ;) Enrico is very helpful, ready to answer all your questions and he has a lot of experience in travelling so he can tell you some interesting stories. Plus - he knows something about wines and he can cook pretty good. :D

After I spent some time in St.petersburg showing the city to Enrico I was very happy that we had a chance to meet again, this time in Rome. He is a great host - his apartment is very clean and comfortable, with very good location, so you can easily go from there to the centre, to the train/bus station, to Fiumicino airport. 
I was glad to spend time with his friends - very nice and creative persons. I'm sure that Enrico always does his best to make guests feel comfortable, he is friendly and attentive, ready to help, to explain everything. It's very important when guests appreciate this help and respect the rules because Enrico deserves to have nice, polite, punctual, easygoing, respectful, neat and tidy guests that don't cause any inconveniences. 
Enrico, I wish you only positive experience with CS in future. And all the best in your life! Ciao!

text:
Enrico was our savior after a sleepless night at the airport and a string of traveller difficulties.

Enrico was very responsive and helpful throughout. We enjoyed conversations about books, wine, photography, art, travel mishaps, and Italy of course!
We also spoke about humanitarianism and could see that he has a good heart. 
We'll definitely contact Enrico the next time we visit Rome!!!

I had a great time in Rome with Enrico and even spent one of the most beautiful dinners of my life with his lovely friends.

Thanks for the nice company and the wonderful time I have had with you, Enrico!

I hope  to see you again in Europe or Philippines or anywhere in the world.

It's a small world...after all.

He's a gentleman and a super nice host ! Very sweet and caring, notice every details. He hosted me for two days and in the end of my trip I lost my phone he helped me out so much with documents and stuff. We had dinner together at a cool Italian restaurant and he was really generous ! I had a Lot of fun eating gelato, driving around late night and also not to forget his scooter lol. But in the end He was really tired tho , I'm sorry ! 
I'm so glad that I met him , he's just a really nice person . Don't miss him if you're going to Rome! :) :) 

I hope we will meet again somewhere sometime, thank you for everything ! xxx

text: Stefano was a wonderful host! I spent only an evening and a day with him but I cant believe it wasnt longer, and I wish it had been! He is very generous, respectful, openminded and interesting. This was my first time travelling alone with couchsurfing but Stefano instantly made me feel at home and relaxed. We spent a wonderful day at the lake and he also went out of his way to help me find a few obscure places in Rome which i wanted to find.. He was also incredibly patient with my attempts to learn Italian! I would 100% recommend him as a host, a very kindhearted person. Grazie mille per tutti Stefano, I hope you come to England one day and we can play badminton like in Robin Hood! :)

text: Stefano is an amazing host - from picking me up from the city when my ride arrived late, to making me a tasty pasta dish, sharing delicious pizza at Eataly and taking me to get the best gelato in Rome, he made me feel very welcome and made my time in Rome truly wonderful. I definitely recommend him as a host - thanks for everything Stefano. =)

text: Stefano was a great host. From teaching me the Bachata to taking me by scooter through Rome at night, he definitely created a great stay for me in his beautiful city. I learned a lot from him that I had no idea about and enjoyed being able to escape from the city to his nice, tidy home. On the last night of my stay, he took my to see Romeo and Juliet in the Roman Globe Theatre. I can't express how happy he made me. I highly recommend Stefano. He will make you feel comfortable and happy wherever you meet.

text: Giulio was a really helpful host. On the evening of our arrival, we were talking about my plan to move to Rome soon and the fact that I did not have a place to stay yet. After (felt) ten minutes there were at least three possibilities and he even arranged a meeting for me. We were talking about the areas, connections and all other conditions. Perfect introduction for me. He was also very trusting, patient with my attempts to speak italian as a bloody starter and you can have very open conversations with him. I have to say that I appreciate all of this very much. Thanks a lot, Giulio - looking forward to meet you again when I'm successfully installed in Roma! And of course you should profit of your new connections to Berlin :) a presto!

text: Giulio was the best host EVER!! He cooked me delicious pasta Sat night and we joined his friends for a salsa class/night club. We had a really interesting city walk on Sun and met more friend for gelato and a jazz night. text: Giulio was a wonderful host. He really embodies what couchsurfing is to me - fruitful exchanges of culture and ideas between internationally minded citizens. His apartment is cozy and accessible by public transit, a nice distance from the busy centre. Giulio is an extremely generous person, showing us around the city with the knowledge of a true Roman. And the food - amazing. My time in Rome with Giulio has definitely been one of my best couchsurfing experiences yet.

text:
I visited Annarita for one night.She was very nice proposing to call when I arrive with bus so she comes by car ,but I went walking and it was a nice walk with some green parts.We visited churchs with her car and she prepared diner including a delicious Italian pasta; even if she had work of renovation in her appartement.
She is a very nice person and was a good experience for a lover of Italy who I am .
Thank you Annarita and let stay in touch .
Very good person, very smart. We had a good time talking and sharing our experiences. Annarita helps to discover the Rome in the best way.

We didnt spend a lot of time with Annarita but she was great to explain us the journey to go in roma. She tried to make more confort for us. Thank you Annarita your welcoming.
Ana√Øs & Pascaline.

Annarita was hosting me and my boyfriend for two nights. She is really helpful -  we arrived very late at night, during our journey she navigated us via whatsapp to get her place. Unfortunately we missed the proper busstop, but she came to pick  us up with her car, we really appreciated it :) She is a kind and interesting  lady, thank you for the hospitality!
Perfect. She is so kindly.she explain a lot of cultural things abput her city
A very strange, non polite and some times agressive. Have some rasist manifestations. It's non spirit of CS

Annarita hosted us for 4 nights. She is smart, clever and friendly lady. She was kind to cook pasta for us when we have arrived and explained the transport system around. She is very curious, likes to collect flowers, plants and other pretty nature things. Also, one day Annarita took us to the seaside, local church and ostria antica. It was nice experience !
fromPublicAddressDescription: St Petersburg, St Petersburg, Russian Federation

text: I stayed 3 nights at Annarita‚Äôs home, which is located approximately 30 minutes outside of the city center. During this time, Annarita and I shared many conversations about a wide variety of topics. As I am a bit shy, Annarita did most of the talking (though I found her to be a great listener whenever I did decide to share!). She‚Äôs a generous person. Non smokers should know that she smokes indoors frequently.  Annarita can share plenty of valuable information about Roman history and local transport. Made me an itinerary, fed me nice meals, drove me to a local abbey. Interesting introduction to Rome! Gracias por todo amiga!

fromPublicAddressDescription: San Fernando, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

text: I got lost, was late - definitely a troublemaker, but Annarita was way too understanding, welcoming and hospitable to stay with. She's a woman whom the more time you spend with, the more surprises you will find.

fromPublicAddressDescription: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires City, Argentina

text: Annarita is a really thoughtful and very friendly lady. She hosted my friend and me for 3 nights, Friday to Monday. Her home is perfectly located between Fiumicion airport and the center of Rome. From the very beginning on, Annarita was very open, fun and talkative. She explained us how to get to the center of Rome and what are the best sights to watch.  After spending the whole day in the city, on Saturday evening, we met her on a jazz festival and she drove us back home. On Sunday, we even went to the vatican with her. Inside the vatican, it was like having a private guide, she was very knowledgeable and explained us a lot about the history and famous paintings. The last evening, she cooked for us some Italian food and brought us to the train station on Monday morning. We had a very great time with her and would gladly come again. We really found an Italian friend in her and can gladly recommend to stay with her. She is an amazing woman, a great english speaker and a very warm person! We can only say thank you to her again!

Unfortunately it was a short visit to Rome and thus a short time in her apartment, once you know how to arrive there is easy to reach each time. We could reach deep conversations and even taking the hand made tour she had prepared for me as a short visit to Rome (for beginners).

Thanks for the host and the stories/knowledge shared.

Annarita is a good host. She hosted me and my friend for 2 nights. She cooked for us and we had a meal together at home. She helped us a lot. She helped with the transport,  the sightseeings of the city and even drove us to the bus station when there was a strike on the last day. Because due to the strike, the public transport stopped for a while, and changed their schedule. Thank you very much!!!

Thank you very much for your support Annarita :) she has been a great host, I stayed at her place for 2 nights almost sick and she took care of me by preparing hot tea with honey and giving me some useful mint candies. Hope to see you soon!
Thanks for hosting me and helping when I was lost on the highway in the dark , all the best  !
It was a really nice stay. Annarita was very helpful with local transport. Also, she show me some good places.

I had an awesome time with Gianni! Even if we couldn't hang out as long as we wanted to I enjoyed it very much. Lots of Italian food and he also took me out dancing to the biggest Latin place for salsa/bachata in Rome. He's very caring and offered everything he was able to. 
I hope we can meet again and catch up on the things we missed out on! 
You're welcome wherever I will end up! Thank you for everything!

Staying with Gianni was great. In a very short notice he responded my request and let me stay with him. He even picked me up from the train station, cooked delicious pasta, and let me sleep in the main bedroom as me and my friend were exhausted! He is super fun and friendly! I would definitely stay with him again! Thank u for everything Gianni!

Gianni is a great host! His home is clean and cosy, and he offers a private room (his bedroom) to his guests whereas he sleeps on the sofa in the living room, which is so nice of him. His house is located outside of Rome in a quiet area and can be a perfect escape from the busy and crowded center. I stayed only one night at Gianni's place but we've spent great time together having dinner with wine, exchanging travel experience and even dancing salsa;) Gianni is a great dancer by the way:) Grazie mille per tutto, Gianni! Buona fortuna!:))

Gianni was a wonderful host! He was extremely nice and friendly, fun and hospitable as a true italian! His apartment is cozy and comfy, Gianni provided me with perfect living conditions and additionally cooked a wonderful pasta fot dinner and coffee. His house is not so close to the city center, but he was so nice to meet me at the station when I arrived and drived me back on motobike when I left. Thank you and hope to see you again! :)

Gianni was a great host! :) It was my sister and mine's first CS experience and he made it extremely  easy and nice to organize, walk around and learn more about Roma (and Italia as a whole). Gianni took us to a couple of amazing places where we could see most of the city from a really high point of view - it was incredible! He cooked for us a really delicious pasta with tuna and took us to an awesome typical Italian pizzeria where we enjoyed really great pizza - one of the best ever!
Gianni, grazie per tutto! We had real fun and amazing time with you and would be very happy to meet again someday somewhere! Ciao :)
fromPublicAddressDescription: London, England, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text: Gianni is an amazing host!!! Kind and polite; he took care as much as he could of me and try to make my only day in Rome the best one; thank you so so much

fromPublicAddressDescription: Ponton di Sant'Ambrogio di valpolicella, Veneto, Italy

text: Gianni is a really nice guy. He showed me around Rome and at his house he would always be worry that I had everything I needed, so then I could feel like home. He cooked pasta for me and made me coffee. He also took me to the train station when I had to go. He slept on the couch so then I could have the room for me, which I really appreciate! Thank you Gianni for having me :)
fromPublicAddressDescription: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

text:
Gianni is the most amazing host!!! He is incredibly hospitable, and has really made it his mission to make me have the best experience I can have. Although I could only stay 2 nights, Gianni went out of his way to ensure I could experience the best of Rome! 

He cooked for me, allowed me to feel at home in his house, and was extremely respectful of my wishes. He made me feel very spoiled and I am lucky to have experienced his hospitality!!!

He taught me some Italian and we shared salsa dance lessons which was fun! He even drew me a map so that while he was working, I could experience the best sights (which were spectacular!!!!!!!!!!) during my stay! 

He is very funny, and it would be great to come back to Roma and spend more time with him!!! He is a genuinely nice guy! 

Thank you for a truly enjoyable experience! You are a very magnifico caro! 
I am sure we will be friends for a long time! 
Xxx
fromPublicAddressDescription: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa

Socrate hosted me and my girlfriend for 2 nights. It was at Easter. In Milan it was very-very difficult to find a host. Socrate was the only one who accepted us! We are very grateful for that!

Socrate helped us (me and my friend) at the last moment, when we had difficulties with our previous host, and agreed to host us at the last moment. He was so generous and gave us our personal flat with our own keys. We had small and really comfortable apartment not so far from the city center. We had our own bathroom, huge bed, some kitchen supplies and fast Internet connection. 
Also we didn't have our laptop with us and we had no way to print our boarding passes, Socrate was so kind to print them for us! Even more, he took us to the bus station by his car, even so he was busy at that moment. 
We are really grateful for being hosted by Socrate! Hope to see you somewhere in this world!

text: Socrate is an amazing host. When we arrived to Milan we didnt know what are we gonna do in the city, we believed there is not that much to see (no offence to Milanese people ) Socrate completely changed our view. He is the best guide ever,  extremely entertaining and with a huge passion for history, hidden places and forgotten nooks... Well...no need to say more, he is one great person. Really hope to see you again and anytime you happen to be anywhere we are - our home is your home :)

text: Maurizio is the best example of person, who you should stay with. He picked me and my friend at the metro station and gave us a lift home with his car. It was nice and comfortable surprise, after long day we were tired and this was great solution, how to get to his home. He was very polite, friendly and first night we had good chat and some drinks also. We stayed with him 2 nights and also in the morning we went for a tasty coffee and cornetto. The second day he took us to a lake Lago Magiore, where we spent nice time also. I would say, I would recommend Maurizio to everybody, who is looking for a great time and for stay with easy going and very friendly person. Maurizo, thank you for your time and great company. I hope, we meet again, you are always welcome at mine. Thanks for 'all inclusive' service, which you provided me and my friend Katka ;-)
inverseReference: {'id': '17654624', 'text': 'Petra and her friend visited me for couple of days, it was really nice to have them around and it was a pleasure to meet her, she is talkative, with sense of humor and open minded, she can share nice experiences about her living in Scotland or just share a beer...the short time that she has been in Milan was really nice and I definitely think she a great CS!', 'createdDate': '2015-06-07T18:02:49Z', 'experience': 'positive', 'relationshipType': 'host', 'isPostTrip': False, 'to': {'id': '1000841509'}, 'from': {'id': '832051', 'publicName': 'Mau Tal', 'publicAddress': {'id': '3537174', 'description': 'Roma, Lazio, Italy'}, 'avatarUrl': 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/images.couchsurfing.us/5KJWGE5/14864634_l_baf9d870b9d6d278423ff46ca3c2e3bb.jpg', 'status': 'maybe', 'isVerified': True, 'isDeleted': False, 'blockedBy': None}, 'inverseReference': None, 'response': None}

text:
My first experience CS with Maurizio was really amazing Just to spend with him some time and you can feel like you know him a long time ago.  He host me for 2 nights in Milano and every moment was nice with me until when I was so tired to walk... He told me just 10 minuts and after was moreeeee hahaha ;)

How can I explain how is him?... So, he is funny, open mind, talkative, polite, nice and also he try all the time to make you feel happy! And you got it! I will be able to write so many things about him but I will not be able to describe how good is him. People like him make that this life make sense.

Grazie  Maurizio for everything that you shared with me and also for your jokes! I really needed that ;)

I wish all the best and hope to see you soon in Z√∫rich!

text:
Together with my 2 friends we spent two nights/three days at Maurizio's place and it was really great time. He is a really helpful and open minded person, very well aware of the geography and history, visited many different countries so you can be sure that you'll always find a topic for an interesting conversation with him. 
We spent some good time together having aperitivo, sharing conversation, He showed us typical italian breakfast and some really cool nightlife in Milan. 
Thanks again for everything!
Asia

text: Maurizio is a kind and friendly person who hosted me and my friends for one night in Milan. Unfortunately he couldn't be our guide around the city on Saturday because he had to take a flight (and I say unfortunately because he seemed to know some history about Milan and I'd have loved to hear that), but we had a great time together on Friday night. He went to the train station to find us and give us an "interesting" lesson about how to drive as crazy Italian people! Also we had dinner with him and his friend, we laught with some jokes and some language exchange and went out for some drinks and music. It was really nice and I'd recommend you to know him. Thanks for your time :)

text: Maurizio is an unbelievablely positive guy, a really open and friendly person. We met in Milan (that being my first visit in the city), and in a relatively short time he managed to show us many places and quarters of the cit, he also talked a lot about the city and its history, the monuments and different buildings. He's also very knowledgeable, funny and intelligent. I was kinda struck by his openness and an absolutely positive attitude. A dude with an attitude! The time we spent together was like an unforgettable experience. My personal impression? He's an absolutely perfect guide and, at the same time, a really nice and trustworthy guy. I would absolutely recommend him to everyone who wants to visit Milan and get to know it better :)

text: You couldn't get a better host than Mau!!!! He is kind, fun, funny, lovely: the biggest-hearted person I've met in Italy!!! text:
Our stay in Milan was unforgettable thanks to Maurizio. He's an excellent host - he not only put us up, but also was very helpful and kind. Although occupied with his job, he found time to pick us up from the train station, to share a lovely evening (eating the best pizza in my life! ), to take us out for an Italian breakfast. What is more, a friend of his gave us a professional guided tour around Milan. We couldn't have been luckier!
Maurizio, we all can't wait to meet you again ( i mean in Poland of course, so this time you're cooking and we're singing songs :D ). Thanks for everything! 
(i'm sending pics tomorrow, i promise :p )
